item.title: Neovim Setup for OCaml
item.description: IntroIn previous post, I elaborated on how to set up Neovim from scratch. However, I didn’t answer the following questions: What if an LSP does not support formatting, how to configure Neovim to support a third-party code formatting tool? How to change configuration files when adding a new programming language? Recently I was learning OCaml, I thought it would be a good chance to answer the questions. Info I assume you have already read my previous post, so I will omit some details here.
